description: 50 pertanyaan tingkat lanjut, seperti diskusi topik abstrak, pemecahan masalah, atau situasi yang lebih formal.

questions.question: If you could live anywhere in the world, where would it be and why?
Can you explain the importance of education in today's society?
What are some challenges your country faces, and how can they be solved?
What is your opinion on the impact of technology on human relationships?
Can you describe a historical event that changed the world?
What qualities make a great leader, in your opinion?
How would you explain the concept of global warming to someone?
What do you think are the advantages and disadvantages of social media?
If you could start a business, what kind of business would it be and why?
What are the most significant challenges young people face today?
How do you think traveling can change a person's perspective?
What would you do if you won a million dollars?
Can you discuss the pros and cons of working from home?
What is your opinion on the role of art in society?
How would you describe your dream house?
If you could invent something new, what would it be?
What is the most important lesson you have learned in life?
How would you explain the importance of mental health to someone?
What are the main benefits of learning a second language?
Can you describe a time when you had to make a difficult decision?
What are your thoughts on environmental conservation?
What do you think makes a movie or book truly great?
If you could meet any historical figure, who would it be and why?
What is your opinion on space exploration?
How would you describe the culture of your country to a foreigner?
What are the most important skills for success in today's world?
What do you think is the best way to handle stress?
If you could change one thing about the world, what would it be?
Can you describe a moment when you felt truly happy?
What do you think are the key factors for a healthy lifestyle?
What is your opinion on the role of technology in education?
How would you define success in your own words?
What are your thoughts on the importance of volunteering?
If you could learn any skill instantly, what would it be?
What is your favorite way to spend a day off?
What is your opinion on the importance of teamwork?
What do you think is the best way to promote creativity?
Can you discuss the impact of music on people's emotions?
If you could spend a day with a famous person, who would it be?
What do you think are the biggest challenges of living in a big city?
How would you describe your ideal vacation?
What are your thoughts on the importance of recycling?
Can you discuss the impact of books on your life?
What do you think is the most important invention of the 21st century?
How would you describe the perfect weekend?
What are the most important things to consider when choosing a career?
If you could write a book, what would it be about?
What do you think are the benefits of traveling to different countries?
What is the best advice you have ever received?
Can you describe an experience that changed your perspective on life?
